user.title: Connect to Claude.ai
user.description:
Enter your Claude.ai session key.

To find it: Open claude.ai → F12 → Application tab → Cookies → claude.ai → copy the value of `sessionKey`.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Claude.ai
reauth_confirm.description:
Your session key has expired. Please enter a new one.

To find it: Open claude.ai → F12 → Application tab → Cookies → claude.ai → copy the value of `sessionKey`.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid session key. Please check the value and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Claude.ai. Please check your network connection.

abort.already_configured: This Claude.ai account is already configured.
